team.name: Akash Kumar
team.title: WordPress Developer, Video Editor
team.bio: Akash is our WordPress developer and Video editor. His content is one of a kind and has been featured in various publications. He also has expertise in WordPress development amd delivering quality service within a short deadline.

team.name: Arun
team.title: Web Developer
team.bio: Arun is our leading web developer. He has a proven track record of delivering high-quality web applications and has extensive experience in building scalable and maintainable web solutions. He has a passion for front-end development and is proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. He has a strong background in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Node.js.

team.name: Krishna Gupta
team.title: Full Stack Developer
team.bio: Krishna is our full stack developer. He is a self-taught developer with a passion for building scalable and efficient web applications. He has a strong background in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Node.js, and is proficient in React, and Vue.js. Krishna is also experienced in working with databases, APIs and has a proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions.
